translation.en: NETFLIX PRESENTS
[Laura] You shouldn't be here.
-♪ No one is perfect enough ♪ -[Laura] I don't have panties.
[in Polish] I couldn't find anything decent.
translation.it: Non ho trovato niente di decente.

translation.en: New house, new wardrobe, but it's still the same old mess.
translation.it: Nuova casa, nuovo guardaroba, ma c'è sempre lo stesso casino.

translation.en: [screams, in English] What the hell are you doing here?
You're sick people. You know that?
[in Polish] You deviants! Freaks! Filthy perverts!
[in English] Massimo, you have to get out of here!
It brings bad luck to see the bride before the wedding.
translation.it: Porta male vedere la sposa prima delle nozze.

translation.en: Not to say to bang her and ruin her makeup!
translation.it: Figuriamoci scoparsela e rovinarle il trucco!

translation.en: [in Polish] You're driving me crazy. You'd give Grandma Krysia a heart attack.
translation.it: Mi fate impazzire. Nonna Krysia avrebbe un infarto.

translation.en: -[in English] Are you jealous? -Listen to me.
Please have some respect for Polish tradition, okay?
translation.it: Porta un po' di rispetto per le tradizioni polacche.

translation.en: If you want, next time you can join us.
translation.it: Unisciti a noi, la prossima volta.

translation.en: Go, go, go!
Adiós, amigos. Ciao, bella!
[in Polish] Or whatever you people say.
[in English] See you later, alligator!
[in Polish] It was supposed to be perfect. The wedding, the dress, and you.
translation.it: Doveva essere tutto stupendo. Matrimonio, vestito, tu.

translation.en: And I was supposed to be relaxing.
Just look at you. [scoffs]
I'm not gonna get on your ass about it, but you never smoke.
translation.it: Non voglio romperti le palle, ma non hai mai fumato prima d'ora.

translation.en: Whatever. If you wanna pretend to be a badass, fine.
translation.it: Vuoi passare per una dura? Ok.

translation.en: [Olga] But I need to know something.
You haven't told him, have you?
Okay. None of my business.
You've been trying to tell him, though, right?
I think about it every day.
Massimo can never know I was pregnant.
translation.it: Massimo non deve sapere che ero incinta.

translation.en: [Olga] That's great.
A dark secret is the foundation of any successful relationship.
translation.it: Un segreto oscuro per un rapporto di successo.

translation.en: [Laura] What should I do?
Tell him I lost the baby in the tunnel where I almost died?
translation.it: Dirgli che ho perso suo figlio in un tunnel dove sono quasi morta?

translation.en: Do you know what he'd do?
What?
[Laura] These people aren't normal.
A war would break out.
[scoffs] A war? Come on.
You know Massimo.
He never lets things go.
Know what a "vendetta" is? [Olga] Mm-hmm.
You do realize we're in Sicily, right?
I mean, I've heard the word before.
In movies. Who hasn't? Of course I know what it means.
translation.it: Nei film. Certo che la conosco, tutti guardano quei film.

translation.en: Oh shit.
I wasn't thinking.
It was the hardest decision of my life.
translation.it: È stata la scelta più dura della mia vita.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're the strongest woman I've ever met. You know that?
translation.it: Sei la donna più forte che conosca, lo sai?

translation.en: Remember, you're not alone. I'm here for you.
translation.it: Ricordati che non sei sola. Sono qui con te.

translation.en: So, do you love him?
Okay, let's go.
Help me get ready. I promise I won't forget my panties this time.
translation.it: Dammi una sistemata. Prometto di non scordarmi le mutande.

translation.en: Here you go. Pick any color you like.
translation.it: Ok, scegli il colore che vuoi.

translation.en: What am I saying? They're all white.
[Massimo] Let's run away from all this mess.
You have one hour.
Then… I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.it: Poi, farò di te tutto ciò che voglio.

translation.en: No. I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.it: No, sarò io a fare tutto ciò che voglio.

translation.en: Sit down.
I don't wanna hurt you.
And now… I want you to fuck me the way I like.
translation.it: E ora, voglio che mi scopi come piace a me.

translation.en: You think this flower will help make me forget that yesterday
translation.it: Pensi che un fiore basti a farmi dimenticare che ieri hai preferito stare con i tuoi amici mafiosi che con me?

translation.en: you preferred the company of your Mafia fellows over mine?
translation.it: che ieri hai preferito stare con i tuoi amici mafiosi che con me?

translation.en: Nope.
[Domenico] But it makes you smile.
How do I look like?
Like the first time, baby.
[Laura] It will be a perfect honeymoon, husband.
translation.it: Sarà una luna di miele perfetta, marito.

translation.en: [Olga, in Polish] Shit.
[Olga, in Polish] You changed your hair!
translation.it: Cazzo, hai cambiato colore dei capelli!

translation.en: [in English] Welcome home!
[in Polish] Nice to see you too. I didn't know we had to bring food.
translation.it: Che bello vedervi. Non sapevamo di dover portare da mangiare.

translation.en: I'm living my best life. I fell in love.
translation.it: Mi sono innamorata e mi godo la vita.

translation.en: And when exactly did that happen?
You're the last person who should be criticizing me.
translation.it: Sei l'ultima che può permettersi di criticarmi.

translation.en: I'm wondering how many pieces of furniture I'll need to replace.
Would you be so kind as to make a list of everything that's been tainted?
translation.it: Mi puoi fare una lista di tutto quello che avete contaminato?

translation.en: Want a raspberry? In Italian, it's called "lampone."
translation.it: Vuoi un lampone? In italiano si dice così.

translation.en: [Laura] You can stick your lampone up your ass.
[in English] I would like to propose you two catch up in a different location
translation.it: Signore, che ne dite di chiacchierare da un'altra parte?

translation.en: 'cause Domenico, now he needs to focus on work.
translation.it: Io e Domenico dobbiamo parlare di lavoro.

translation.en: Of course, when he's wearing a normal suit and not…
translation.it: Quando sarà vestito da persona normale e non con…

translation.en: What is that, a… a cake or something?
[in English] Um, I arranged a little trip for you two.
Do I look like furniture that you can move around?
translation.it: Non sono un mobile da spostare come vuoi.

translation.en: -I want you to have fun with your friend. -Oh, really?
translation.it: - Voglio che ti diverti con la tua amica. - Sì?

translation.en: -It's not a joke. -[Laura] Why don't you put a leash on me?
translation.it: - Sono serio. - Perché non mi metti un guinzaglio?

translation.en: Oh, I can see honeymoon is over.
translation.it: La luna di miele è proprio finita.

translation.en: [in Polish] Shut up.
Calm down. We could use a vacation.
translation.it: Calma, una vacanza ci farà bene.

translation.en: It's been so long, I've forgotten what alcohol looks like.
translation.it: Non mi ricordo nemmeno come sia bere dell'alcol.

translation.en: [in Polish] What's on your mind?
Nothing. I'm just enjoying being here.
translation.it: Non è niente. Qui sto bene.

translation.en: -Is that why you're acting so serious? -[Laura] I'm not.
translation.it: - E sei così seria per questo? - Non sono seria.

translation.en: I just feel bad about Massimo.
He's making a real effort. He arranged this trip.
Sometimes I think I'm just like my mom. [Olga] Uh-uh.
translation.it: A volte mi comporto come mia madre.

translation.en: Nope. Even worse. You're a typical wife.
translation.it: No, peggio. Ti comporti come una moglie.

translation.en: Thanks, Olga. I can always count on you.
translation.it: Grazie, posso sempre contare su di te.

translation.en: No worries. Happy to help.
translation.it: Non c'è di che, quando vuoi.

translation.en: Listen. It's simple, really.
You know what Massimo likes, so just do that.
translation.it: Sai cosa gli piace, quindi sai cosa fare.

translation.en: Oh shit!
I've got an idea.
[in English] It is so late.
I'm sure you can spend a few more minutes with me.
translation.it: Di sicuro potrai restare con me ancora un po'.

translation.en: I promise you won't regret it.
translation.it: Prometto che non te ne pentirai.

translation.en: I know. [sighs]
But it's very late. I have to leave.
translation.it: Ma è davvero tardi, devo andare.

translation.en: [Massimo] We're back to our normal life, baby girl, aren't we?
translation.it: Siamo tornati alla normalità, bambolina. No?

translation.en: [man] Oh yeah. Oh yeah.
-[woman gasps] -[man] You're beautiful.
[Laura, in Polish] Holy shit.
-[in Italian] Shit. -[in Polish] Knock first.
-Get dressed. We're leaving. -[Olga] Domenico isn't going anywhere.
translation.it: - Bussa! - Vestiti, andiamo. Domenico non va da nessuna parte.

translation.en: I'll be back in 30 minutes.
Be ready by then, okay?
At least be dressed.
Or just be out from under him!
-[in English] We need to finish. -[both moaning]
[Domenico] Oh yes!
[in Polish] Watch out. Careful! Wait.
You're filthy rich, and we still have to run on the grass!
translation.it: Sei una riccona e dobbiamo correre sull'erba?

translation.en: -[in English] Ooh! Hi, George! -[both giggling]
[in Polish] Hey, let me drive this time.
-[sighs] We're here. -Come on.
-Just who will be paying for the damage? -What?
translation.it: Olga, e poi chi paga i danni?

translation.en: I drive around Włochy in Warsaw. If I can do it there, I can do it here.
translation.it: Ma se ho guidato a Varsavia. Se ci sono riuscita lì…

translation.en: Hop in.
Okay.
[in English] Move out.
-[in Polish] No. Want me to sit and wave? -Scoot over. Come on.
translation.it: No, vuoi che me ne stia seduta a salutare?

translation.en: Okay. I'll sit and wave.
translation.it: Ok, me ne starò seduta a salutare.

translation.en: I like it. Just look at me, sitting and waving.
translation.it: Mi piace stare seduta e salutare, guardami.

translation.en: [in Polish] Let's go.
[in Polish] Remember how we met? No.
translation.it: - Ricordi come ci siamo conosciute? - No.

translation.en: Remember your mom hanging out the window with a plate in her hand?
translation.it: E tua mamma alla finestra con un piatto in mano?

translation.en: [both, drawn out] Mom!
[Olga] How old were we back then? Six?
Mm-hmm. Even back then, you had powder on your plate.
Hey! It was just powdered Jell-O.
translation.it: Ma dai, era solo zucchero a velo.

translation.en: We ate it with our fingers and went roller-skating. Remember?
translation.it: Lo mangiavamo con le dita e poi andavamo a pattinare.

translation.en: Honestly? I prefer life now, 20 years later.
translation.it: Sinceramente, si sta meglio ora. 20 anni dopo.

translation.en: My skates weren't as fast as the Ferrari. Not for lack of trying.
translation.it: I miei pattini non erano veloci come una Ferrari.

translation.en: You know what?
What?
It doesn't matter what we drive or what we eat,
translation.it: Non importa con cosa ci spostiamo o quello che mangiamo.

translation.en: as long as we're together.
Forever.
With you, I don't even mind having to walk everywhere.
translation.it: Con te, posso anche andare a piedi da qualsiasi parte.

translation.en: [Olga] Love you.
I love you too.
[in Polish] I've missed this.
[Laura] Lately, everything's gone sideways. Yep.
translation.it: - Ultimamente va tutto male. - Ma smettila.

translation.en: Oh shit.
[in Polish] I guess we're not having dessert.
[in English] We're leaving.
[in Polish] Did you hear that?
[in English] I said… we're leaving.
translation.it: Ho detto che ce ne andiamo.

translation.en: I have needs.
I know that our beginnings were quite rough,
translation.it: So che il nostro rapporto è iniziato in modo strano.

translation.en: or more like sick.
You've kidnapped me, and this is sick.
translation.it: Mi hai rapito. Ed è da malati.

translation.en: But I fell in love with you, and we are together because I decided.
translation.it: Ma mi sono innamorata. Siamo insieme perché l'ho scelto io.

translation.en: You cannot control people, and I won't let you control me.
translation.it: Non puoi controllare gli altri e di certo non controllerai me.

translation.en: -I'm your wife, not one of your soldiers. -What are you talking about?
translation.it: Sono tua moglie. - Non uno dei tuoi soldati. - Ma che dici?

translation.en: -I just want to protect you. -[Laura] This is not protection.
translation.it: Voglio solo proteggerti. Non è protezione.

translation.en: This is prison.
I can't live without doing anything.
translation.it: Non posso vivere senza fare qualcosa.

translation.en: I miss challenges.
[Massimo] You're right, my girl. I screwed this up. ♪ You were in love with me ♪
translation.it: Hai ragione, piccola mia. Ho rovinato tutto.

translation.en: [echoing] Excuse me.
Mrs. Torricelli, right?
I didn't want to disturb you.
-[song fades] -Mrs. Torricelli, right?
Yeah.
I'm the new gardener, Nacho.
[Laura] Nacho?
Nacho. Nice to meet you.
You have a nice cap.
[chuckles] Yes, I know. Thank you.
[Laura] But Nacho? It doesn't sound very Italian. It's a nickname.
translation.it: - Nacho non sembra un nome italiano. - È un soprannome.

translation.en: My family has Spanish roots.
translation.it: La mia famiglia ha origini spagnole.

translation.en: And you? Where are you from?
Poland.
Thirsty?
[Nacho] Oh, yes.
Thank you.
How long have you been working for my husband?
translation.it: Da quanto lavori per mio marito?

translation.en: [Nacho] I just started.
Mr. Torricelli wants some changes in the garden.
translation.it: Vuole fare delle modifiche al giardino.

translation.en: I have to work.
I wouldn't like to waste your precious time.
translation.it: Non voglio farle perdere tempo prezioso.

translation.en: Wasting my time?
You're talking to a person who has absolutely nothing to do.
translation.it: Sono una persona che non ha assolutamente niente da fare.

translation.en: Now my only job is being a… wife.
translation.it: Il mio unico lavoro è fare la… moglie.

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
You're wrong, missus.
Being a good wife is one of the most difficult jobs in the world.
translation.it: Fare la moglie è uno dei lavori più difficili di sempre.

translation.en: [scoffs] It's why I'm so perfect at it.
'Cause I don't have to do anything.
They cook for me. They clean for me. Even they cut flowers for me.
translation.it: Cucinano per me, puliscono per me. Tagliano persino i miei fiori.

translation.en: It's why I'm so perfect at doing nothing.
translation.it: Sono perfetta per non fare niente.

translation.en: You are a real busy bee.
That's a great talent.
To be perfect without doing anything.
translation.it: Essere perfetti senza bisogno di fare niente.

translation.en: [chuckles] Please don't tell me that you also make money by doing nothing.
translation.it: Ma non mi dica che è diventata così ricca senza fare niente.

translation.en: Where do you think it all comes from?
translation.it: Secondo te, da dove viene tutto questo?

translation.en: You need to teach me that.
[woman] Mrs. Torricelli!
I must go. Thank you for the water.
Ah. I will cut some flowers for you.
It was a pleasure, Laura from Poland.
translation.it: È stato un piacere, Laura dalla Polonia.

translation.en: It was a pleasure, Nacho the gardener.
translation.it: Anche per me, Nacho il giardiniere.

translation.en: So, let's see what's inside.
Congrats.
You are the owner of your own clothing company.
translation.it: Ora hai una tua azienda di abbigliamento.

translation.en: So, I know that you love work,
and I want you to be free to do what you love.
translation.it: Ti voglio libera di fare ciò che ami.

translation.en: And I know that you love fashion.
translation.it: E so che ami la moda.

translation.en: -♪ All I want is you ♪ -[mouthing] I love you.
[Laura] It's hard to get a present for someone who has everything.
translation.it: È difficile fare regali a una persona che ha già tutto.

translation.en: But I will give you something I think you should like.
translation.it: Ma ti darò qualcosa che secondo me ti piacerà.

translation.en: -What? -♪ I will take care of you ♪
Open it…
if you're brave enough.
Is this a fucking summer-edition proposal?
translation.it: È una specie di offerta speciale del cazzo?

translation.en: Or it's real?
[chuckles] Pumpkin.
[in English] Baby.
I don't want to sound impatient, but…
I think that Santa has forgotten me.
translation.it: Babbo Natale si è scordato di me.

translation.en: Santa is coming.
He will let you know where is the present.
translation.it: Ti farà sapere dov'è il regalo.

translation.en: What?
Be patient.
I think I've seen this before.
translation.it: Mi sembra di averlo già visto.

translation.en: Now the only thing that's missing is the lion.
This is your present, Don Massimo.
I trust you.
I want to give you everything you wanna take.
translation.it: Ti darò tutto ciò che ti vuoi prendere.

translation.en: Everything is there.
♪ Don't get me wrong ♪ ♪ But I don't like promises ♪
Thank you for arranging the arrival of my parents.
translation.it: Grazie per aver organizzato il viaggio ai miei.

translation.en: It was a wonderful gift.
[softly] Anything for you.
Don't you miss your family?
Because, besides Domenico, you have nobody.
translation.it: Non hai nessuno, a parte Domenico.

translation.en: You had Mario.
It was Mario's own decision to retire.
I didn't make him do it.
He couldn't deal with…
After the accident, he was blaming himself for what happened,
translation.it: Continuava a darsi la colpa dopo l'incidente.

translation.en: but I know that he couldn't do anything.
translation.it: So che non poteva farci nulla.

translation.en: But… he's a man of honor.
And I've lost my right hand.
translation.it: Ho perso il mio braccio destro.

translation.en: Yeah.
I know how important he was in your life.
translation.it: So quanto fosse importante nella tua vita.

translation.en: Sometimes I think that, uh,
you feel so lonely…
'cause besides me, you have no one.
translation.it: perché non hai nessuno a parte me.

translation.en: No parents, no siblings.
I have a brother.
But I'd rather not have him.
But… correct me if I'm wrong…
Do we still have something to try out?
You have a brother? And you didn't tell me about this before?
translation.it: Hai un fratello? E non me lo hai mai detto?

translation.en: I still have some work to do.
No, do not tell me that you're about to leave.
translation.it: Non dirmi che te ne vuoi andare.

translation.en: -Massimo! -[door opens]
[Olga, in Polish] This is one hell of a present.
translation.it: Wow, questo sì che è un regalo.

translation.en: [Emily, in English] Hello, ladies. I am Emily.
-Hello. -I'm glad you're here.
-[both kiss twice] -Thank you so much.
I'm Laura, and this is my best friend, Olga.
translation.it: Io sono Laura e lei è Olga, la mia migliore amica.

translation.en: [Emily, in English] Hi.
[in Polish] Luxury is my middle name.
-[in English] Do you like it? -[gasps] Amazing.
If I understand correctly, we have to talk about business
translation.it: Se ho capito bene, parleremo di affari dopo capodanno.

translation.en: after the New Year.
And today we have to make you look like superstars. Is that right?
translation.it: Mentre oggi devo trasformarvi in superstar, giusto?

translation.en: Sure, sure. But remember, I'm the hot goddess.
translation.it: Certo, ma ricordati che sono la dea della sensualità.

translation.en: You get used to her.
Or not.
[in Polish] Laura, what's going on?
-Nothing. -What do you mean? Something's wrong.
-I don't want to talk about it. -Do I have to force it out of you?
translation.it: - Non voglio parlarne. - Vuoi che ti costringa?

translation.en: I'm pissed off at Massimo.
But I'm not discussing it with him or with you.
translation.it: Ma non voglio parlarne. Né con lui, né con te.

translation.en: I get it. I respect your decision. Booze would help.
[in English] It's enough for me. I want to go back.
[in English] Can't you see I'm in the middle of a conversation?
Yeah. You're so gentle, talking to him,
translation.it: Sì, con lui sei così gentile. Gli parli.

translation.en: but talking to me, it's a different situation, right?
translation.it: Parlare con me è un'altra cosa, vero?

translation.en: I have one more last conversation.
[quietly] Yeah.
Right.
I'll do my best to be quick.
All conversations are more important than one with me.
translation.it: Parlare con gli altri è più importante che con me.

translation.en: [in Polish] Thanks for inviting us. I haven't had this much fun in ages.
translation.it: Era tantissimo che non mi divertivo così.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not sure I can say the same about Dad.
translation.it: Non so se lo stesso si può dire di papà.

translation.en: If the love of my life is having fun, so am I.
translation.it: Se l'amore della mia vita si diverte, mi diverto anch'io.

translation.en: [Laura] You know what?
You've been married for 30 years,
and I wish Massimo looked at me the same way Dad looks at you.
translation.it: vorrei che Massimo mi guardasse come papà guarda te.

translation.en: Sweetie, you need to understand that marriage is about compromise.
translation.it: Tesoro, devi capire che il matrimonio si basa sui compromessi.

translation.en: Don't you agree, honey?
I wouldn't dare think otherwise.
And now… let's dance. Just you and me.
translation.it: E ora, balliamo. Solo io e te.

translation.en: [Nacho, in English] Laura?
Do you feel okay?
Get me out from here.
[Laura] Can you stop the car, please?
[quietly] My God.
How could he be so stupid? And with her?
translation.it: Come ha potuto? E proprio con lei?

translation.en: I wish I could go away from here and never come back.
translation.it: Vorrei andarmene da qui e non tornare più.

translation.en: I'm flying home in a few hours.
translation.it: Tra poche ore ho il volo per casa.

translation.en: We will find a ticket…
if you want to sort things out… away from here.
translation.it: Se vuoi schiarirti le idee lontano, ti aspetto.

translation.en: Wait for a second.
[voice mail] The number you are trying to reach is currently unavailable.
translation.it: Segreteria telefonica. Lasciate un messaggio dopo il segnale.

translation.en: -Please try again later. -[line beeps]
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio dopo il segnale.

translation.en: [in Polish] Mom, I'm sorry. You were right.
I was wrong about Massimo.
After what I saw, I don't want to see him ever again. Obviously.
translation.it: Dopo quello a cui ho assistito, non voglio vederlo mai più.

translation.en: I need to get away for a while and collect my thoughts.
translation.it: Sì. Devo andarmene per un po' e riordinare le idee.

translation.en: Don't worry about me. I'm safe.
I love you. I'll call in a few days.
translation.it: Ti voglio bene. Ti chiamo tra qualche giorno.

translation.en: [in English] Take me anywhere, but take me away from here.
translation.it: Portami dove vuoi, purché sia lontano da qui.

translation.en: Wow, you look great.
I like you in this outfit.
I took what I found in the closet.
Maybe it's your girlfriend's?
I think she prefers a sporty style.
Sister's. I don't have a girlfriend, Laura.
translation.it: Di mia sorella. Non ho una ragazza.

translation.en: These are my sister's clothes.
Come.
Dinner is ready.
Look what I made for you. My favorite dish.
translation.it: Guarda qua. Il mio piatto preferito.

translation.en: -Paella. -But dinner?
Did I sleep so long?
It's so nice here.
It's my father's house.
Anyway, my sister Amelia will come by later.
translation.it: Comunque, dopo verrà mia sorella Amelia.

translation.en: I think you will like each other.
She's a cool girl.
She's a bit moody.
You know,
pregnancy hormones.
Your sister is pregnant. I'm sorry.
Are you okay?
It's just a pity she chose an asshole for the father.
translation.it: Purtroppo il padre è un coglione.

translation.en: Wait a moment.
I have to clean.
[Klara, in Polish] I'm gonna kill him! Excuse me. Leave me alone!
[in English] I have no idea where she--
translation.it: Non ho idea di dove sia…

translation.en: What did you do to her? What did you do to my daughter?
translation.it: Cosa le hai fatto? Cosa hai fatto a mia figlia?

translation.en: She recorded a message saying she was leaving you.
translation.it: Mi ha lasciato un messaggio dicendo che è finita.

translation.en: She never wants to see you again.
I knew you were a bad person since I met you.
translation.it: Ho capito subito che sei una brutta persona.

translation.en: I don't know what you did to her, but I know one thing.
translation.it: Non so cosa tu le abbia fatto, ma una cosa la so.

translation.en: If my daughter decided to leave you,
translation.it: Se mia figlia ha deciso di lasciarti,

translation.en: she has a damn good reason for it!
We are going back to Poland.
We'll wait for her to come home.
My husband is already in the car.
translation.it: Mio marito è già in auto.

translation.en: Don't try to stop me.
[in English] Ignacio has been so sweet since I'm pregnant.
translation.it: Ignazio è un tesoro da quando sono incinta.

translation.en: I'm treated like a queen.
How do you know that Nacho doesn't like him?
translation.it: Come fai a dire che a Nacho non piace?

translation.en: Because he's Sicilian.
I used to like Sicilians.
You used to love the Sicilians.
That's even worse.
I can see that your brother takes care a lot about you.
translation.it: Si vede che tuo fratello ti vuole davvero bene.

translation.en: Yeah, Nacho is wonderful. The best.
translation.it: Sì, Nacho è fantastico. Il migliore.

translation.en: Just don't tell him I said that. [chuckles]
translation.it: Ma non dirgli che te l'ho detto.

translation.en: [sighs] I would like to see him finally settle down with some nice girl.
translation.it: Sarei felice se si sistemasse con una brava ragazza.

translation.en: Like you. He deserves it.
How do you know I'm nice? You just met me.
translation.it: Come fai a dirlo? Non mi conosci.

translation.en: Intuition. It never disappoints me.
And there is something between you two, I hope.
translation.it: E spero che tra voi due ci sia qualcosa.

translation.en: Oh, really?
But you know, my life got complicated, so right now, I have to fix it.
translation.it: Ho una vita complicata. Prima devo sistemarla.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
And you know that Nacho worked for me as a gardener?
[Amelia] As a gardener?
Oh my God, my brother will never cease to amaze me.
translation.it: Dio, mio fratello riesce sempre a stupirmi.

translation.en: So, you didn't know what he was doing in Sicily?
translation.it: Non sapevi cosa faceva in Sicilia?

translation.en: [Amelia] Honey, you can't keep up with Nacho.
He's the most spontaneous person I know, and he's also very loyal to his family.
translation.it: È la persona più spontanea che conosco ed è molto leale alla sua famiglia.

translation.en: Maybe too loyal sometimes.
-[Nacho grunts] -Nacho!
-I did my hair and makeup. Come on. -[softly] Sorry.
translation.it: - Dai, mi sono truccata e pettinata! - Scusa.

translation.en: I forgive you.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
You're so good at it.
[clicks tongue] I'm not sure if it was a compliment
translation.it: Non ho capito se era un complimento

translation.en: or you just cut my balls.
translation.it: o se mi hai tagliato le palle.

translation.en: Anyway,
thank you.
[softly] I miss him.
I know.
But tell me one thing.
Why always good girls fall in love with bad guys?
translation.it: Perché le brave ragazze si innamorano sempre dei cattivi?

translation.en: How do you know I'm good?
translation.it: Che ne sai che sono brava?

translation.en: Maybe something's wrong with me because he cheated on me.
translation.it: Se mi ha tradita, forse ho qualcosa che non va.

translation.en: Laura…
don't you ever say that again.
It's not your fault.
A guy cheating on a woman like you must be an idiot.
translation.it: Se un uomo tradisce una donna come te, deve essere un idiota.

translation.en: Without balls.
-Do you understand? -[both chuckle]
You understand.
Good.
We can watch the movie now.
And drink.
Smile.
[Laura] Thank you for letting me stay here.
[softly] You're welcome.
[in English] Hey!
[in English] I'm here too, if you haven't noticed.
translation.it: Ci sono anch'io, se non lo sapete.

translation.en: And if you are talking about Laura, I want to know everything, you understand?
translation.it: Se parlate di Laura, voglio sapere tutto, ok?

translation.en: Pumpkin, we're trying to do business--
[in Polish] Don't "pumpkin" me!
[in English] Laura is fucking gone,
and you're talking about business?
[in Polish] No fucking way!
[in English] Baby, please calm down.
I can't calm down. I'm Polish.
[in Polish] Dammit.
[softly, in English] Make love with me.
You killed him?
Unfortunately not. He will be fine.
For now.
Are you okay?
[Laura] What happened last night?
Don't think about it.
You are safe here.
Tell me.
[Nacho] Someone broke in.
It's over now. The police will take care of it.
translation.it: È tutto finito. Ci penserà la polizia.

translation.en: But… why would anyone break into your house?
translation.it: Ma perché quell'uomo voleva entrare in casa tua?

translation.en: And why can an ordinary gardener like you have all of this?
translation.it: E come fa un semplice giardiniere ad avere tutto questo?

translation.en: What a luxury life.
I told you.
My father is a wealthy man.
I'm trying to become independent of him.
Enjoy.
Sorry, 'cause you helped me in a very difficult moment in my life,
translation.it: Scusami, tu mi hai aiutato in un momento molto difficile e…

translation.en: and right now, I take it out on you.
translation.it: Scusami, tu mi hai aiutato in un momento molto difficile e… E io me la sto prendendo con te.

translation.en: [Nacho] I deserve it.
[Laura] You do not deserve it.
Sometimes I act so irrational.
translation.it: A volte mi comporto in modo irrazionale.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
it's fine.
Now, let's eat. We have plans for today.
translation.it: E ora, mangiamo. Abbiamo da fare.

translation.en: I do appreciate your good spirit, but, you know, because of last night,
translation.it: Apprezzo la positività, ma dopo ieri notte

translation.en: I don't have a good mood to do anything special.
translation.it: non sono dell'umore di fare qualcosa.

translation.en: [Nacho] You're right.
It would be better if we stay at home and get upset about last night.
translation.it: Meglio starcene a casa a rimuginare su ieri notte.

translation.en: So, where do you want to get upset?
translation.it: Allora, dove ci mettiamo a rimuginare?

translation.en: In the dining room?
Or the dancing hall?
Or…
let me take you to a place where you can smile.
translation.it: ti porto in un posto dove puoi sorridere.

translation.en: I promise if you don't smile there, we will come back here and weep together.
translation.it: Ti prometto che, se non sorriderai, torneremo qui a piangere insieme.

translation.en: Eat, please.
I think this car is so cool.
It's cooler than your husband's spaceship, huh?
Corvette, 1992. The best year.
[Laura] Like wine?
I like this model.
[Nacho, in English] Like it?
Yeah.
[Laura] I can say this one is, um, different than I used to drink.
translation.it: È diversa da quelle che bevevo.

translation.en: Or maybe this one guy's just different from the ones you had before.
translation.it: Forse perché questo ragazzo è diverso da quelli che avevi.

translation.en: It's so beautiful here, yeah?
[Nacho] We can only come here by sea.
translation.it: Ci si arriva solo via mare.

translation.en: So, that's the perfect place for a date because you know you can't run away.
translation.it: È perfetto per un appuntamento perché non puoi scappare.

translation.en: Success is guaranteed.
[Nacho] Yeah. That's true.
I usually come here with all my girlfriends.
translation.it: Ci vengo con tutte le mie ragazze.

translation.en: From Poland.
Any of those Polish girlfriends ever escape from you?
translation.it: Una di queste ragazze polacche è mai riuscita a sfuggirti?

translation.en: Never.
[Laura] Hold my beer.
[Nacho] I will leave you with my sister for a moment.
translation.it: Ti lascio un attimo con mia sorella.

translation.en: I need to take care of one thing.
[Amelia] Hi, guys.
-Hi. -[Amelia] Hi.
Wow, you look so gorgeous in that dress.
translation.it: - Wow, sei bellissima con questo vestito. - Grazie

translation.en: -Thank you. -Ladies.
translation.it: - Wow, sei bellissima con questo vestito. - Grazie Signore, immagino che non vi mancherò troppo.

translation.en: I can see you won't be missing me too much.
translation.it: Signore, immagino che non vi mancherò troppo.

translation.en: But I hope you will miss me a little bit.
translation.it: Ma spero che almeno un po' sì.

translation.en: Let's sit.
How are you?
I'm going for a swim.
What's wrong?
I will teach you something.
[Laura] What?
Surfing without waves.
[screams] I don't have an outfit! Stop!
No! [squeals]
Now it doesn't matter.
[Nacho, in English] Are you having a nightmare
or just an erotic dream?
Nobody taught you that gentlemen
translation.it: Non ti hanno insegnato che i gentiluomini

translation.en: do not come to a woman's bedroom uninvited?
translation.it: devono essere invitati in camera di una signora?

translation.en: Technically speaking, this is my bedroom
that I'm sharing with you
so you don't have to sleep on the beach.
translation.it: per non farti dormire in spiaggia.

translation.en: You must admit
that I am a real gentleman.
Anyway, I just came to tell you that food is ready.
translation.it: Comunque, ero solo venuto a dirti che è pronto.

translation.en: Was it… a nightmare
or just an erotic dream?
-It was sex. -[Nacho] With whom?
With you.
And did you like it to be?
It was pretty good, but in my entire life, I had better.
translation.it: Niente male, ma ho visto di meglio.

translation.en: This is my asylum.
One day, I would like to leave here for good with someone like you.
translation.it: Un giorno, vorrei andarmene per sempre con qualcuno come te.

translation.en: But for now, you're stuck here with me, so… I'm not going anywhere… yet.
translation.it: Ma per ora, sei bloccato qui con me. Non me ne vado. Per ora.

translation.en: We are going to see my father today.
[Laura] And? That makes you worried, or what?
I've already met your sister, and you're not going to tell him
translation.it: Ho già conosciuto tua sorella e non devi dirgli che ci sposeremo o altro.

translation.en: that we're getting married or something like this. So?
translation.it: e non devi dirgli che ci sposeremo o altro. Quindi?

translation.en: Massimo will be there.
[in Spanish] Sir, they're here.
Let them wait.
[in English] Who are you?
And stop telling me bullshit about being a gardener.
translation.it: Basta con le stronzate sul giardiniere.

translation.en: This is the only moment that you can tell me the truth.
translation.it: È l'unica occasione per dirmi la verità.

translation.en: I am Marcelo "Nacho" Matos,
son of Don Fernando Matos,
the head of the local Mafia
and eternal rival of your husband's family.
translation.it: ed eterno rivale della famiglia di tuo marito.

translation.en: So, your father told you to bring me to the island?
translation.it: Ti ha detto tuo padre di portarmi qui?

translation.en: No. You came here because you wanted to.
What if I didn't want to?
I would've found a way.
[Laura] Fuck.
I was so naive.
I thought that you were my real friend
and nothing was a coincidence.
Laura, I wasn't faking my feelings for you.
translation.it: Laura, non ho finto i miei sentimenti per te.

translation.en: So I guess I have to thank you.
'Cause you proved that men aren't good. Only good at lying.
translation.it: Mi hai dimostrato che gli uomini non sono buoni, solo bravi a mentire.

translation.en: You think I would fake all of this?
translation.it: Pensi che sia tutta una finta?

translation.en: Take you to the beach?
Teach you to surf?
And the kiss?
You didn't feel it was real?
It was real, like a fairy tale.
And if you think I would fall in love again with a guy who thinks
translation.it: E se credi che mi innamorerò di nuovo di un uomo

translation.en: he can have me just like that, you're absolutely wrong.
translation.it: che pensa di potermi avere così, ti sbagli di grosso.

translation.en: 'Cause I've learned from my mistakes,
and I've learned that you're a fuckin' liar.
translation.it: E ho imparato che sei un bugiardo.

translation.en: [Nacho] Be rational.
I didn't make you come here.
translation.it: Non ti ho costretta a venire.

translation.en: You came with me because you felt safe.
translation.it: Sei venuta perché ti sentivi al sicuro.

translation.en: You ruined everything since the moment you hid the truth from me.
translation.it: Hai rovinato tutto nascondendomi la verità.

translation.en: And I'm done with guys who think that they can do whatever they want.
translation.it: E ho chiuso con gli uomini che pensano di poter fare quello che vogliono.

translation.en: Take me there.
Let's end with these gangster games.
Fuck. [exhales]
I always dreamed of living in a beach house and opening a surf school.
translation.it: Ho sempre sognato di vivere sulla spiaggia e insegnare surf.

translation.en: I was just unlucky to be born into the wrong family.
translation.it: Sono solo nato nella famiglia sbagliata.

translation.en: My father had different plans for me.
translation.it: Mio padre aveva altre idee per me.

translation.en: Laura, for God's sake, you are the wife of a Mafia boss.
translation.it: Laura, santo cielo, sei la moglie di un boss mafioso.

translation.en: You know how important the loyalty is for the family.
translation.it: Sai quanto è importante la lealtà alla famiglia.

translation.en: When the Mob boss is your father,
translation.it: Se il boss è tuo padre,

translation.en: you don't have much choice.
[Laura] No. You always have a choice.
The thing is, you have to take responsibility of your own life.
translation.it: Devi assumerti la responsabilità della tua vita.

translation.en: [in Spanish] We'll take care of her now.
translation.it: A partire da ora, ci occupiamo noi di lei.

translation.en: No. She's coming with me.
Don Matos asked you to come alone.
translation.it: Don Matos la vuole vedere da solo.

translation.en: Nobody told me about that.
He already has guests.
[in English] Laura.
What?
-Be careful. -[Laura] Oh, really?
I don't think anything worse than the last few days could happen.
translation.it: Non sarà mai peggio degli ultimi giorni.

translation.en: Thank you for accepting the invitation to the meeting.
translation.it: La ringrazio per aver accettato il mio invito.

translation.en: [Massimo] I didn't really have a choice.
Oh, I would like to apologize that we are meeting
translation.it: Mi scuso per le circostanze spiacevoli del nostro incontro,

translation.en: in such unpleasant circumstances, but I believe that, as a businessman,
translation.it: Mi scuso per le circostanze spiacevoli del nostro incontro, ma credo che, come uomo d'affari,

translation.en: you will understand that the goal justifies the means.
translation.it: capirà che il fine giustifica i mezzi.

translation.en: After all, the stakes are high.
translation.it: Dopotutto, la posta in gioco è alta.

translation.en: Our family had the non-aggression pact.
translation.it: Tra le nostre famiglie c'è un patto di non aggressione.

translation.en: You violated it.
Oh, your father and I, we were both men of honor.
translation.it: Io e suo padre eravamo uomini d'onore.

translation.en: As long as he was alive,
we both respected the borders of our interests.
translation.it: non abbiamo sconfinato negli interessi reciproci.

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] But you, Massimo,
you're expanding too much.
Some people don't like it.
Some people?
Some people, who?
You?
[Fernando] We have been sending you warnings.
Laura's accident.
But you were too convinced of your own strength.
translation.it: Ma è troppo convinto della sua forza.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Your father was wise.
He knew that no opponent should be taken lightly.
I cannot bear…
more chances with you as a boss.
translation.it: altri rischi con lei al comando.

translation.en: All the families would benefit from someone more, uh,
translation.it: Per tutte le famiglie sarebbe vantaggioso avere

translation.en: controllable to be in your place.
translation.it: qualcuno più controllabile al suo posto.

translation.en: We figured your stupid brother will do perfect.
translation.it: Quello stupido di suo fratello sarebbe perfetto.

translation.en: He's so blinded with revenge and greed
translation.it: Così accecato da vendetta e avidità

translation.en: that he doesn't care much for the family business.
translation.it: che non gli importa degli affari di famiglia.

translation.en: You're wrong.
You're wrong… if you think I'm gonna put my father's empire
translation.it: Si sbaglia, se crede che metterò l'impero di mio padre

translation.en: into the hands of a dog.
Sit down. Massimo--
[panting] A traitor who put my dad into the hands of Death!
translation.it: Un traditore che ha spinto mio padre tra le braccia della morte!

translation.en: You're fucking wrong!
Let me remind you that your wife is still with us.
translation.it: Le ricordo che sua moglie è ancora con noi.

translation.en: You call yourself a man of honor?
And you use my wife this way?
translation.it: e poi usa mia moglie così?

translation.en: Massimo, coming here with Nacho was Laura's decision.
translation.it: Massimo, è stata Laura a scegliere di venire qui con Nacho.

translation.en: Nobody made her do it.
I need to see my wife.
I need to see my wife. Now.
Oh, I can assure you that she's safe.
translation.it: Le garantisco che è al sicuro.

translation.en: Marcelo brought her to the island and has been taking care for her.
translation.it: Marcelo l'ha portata sull'isola e si è preso cura di lei.

translation.en: Now she's with Miguel, my personal bodyguard.
translation.it: Ora è con Miguel, la mia guardia del corpo personale.

translation.en: -You said Laura's with Miguel? -[Fernando] Yes.
I wanted to make sure she'd be safe.
Laura left with Enrique and the other bodyguard.
translation.it: Laura se ne è andata con Enrique e l'altra guardia.

translation.en: [in English] What?
[in Spanish] Find her.
[in English] We need to go. Now.
[Laura] You were the biggest mistake of my life.
translation.it: Sei stato l'errore più grande della mia vita.

translation.en: How could you?
How could you?
You're not Massimo.
No. [sniffles]
I'm not.
[inhales sharply] I am Adriano Torricelli.
The twin brother who was so unlucky because he was born ten minutes later.
translation.it: Il fratello gemello sfortunato, che è nato dieci minuti più tardi.

translation.en: Ten minutes. Ten minutes.
But it's nice to meet you,
baby girl.
[Laura] Do not call me "baby girl."
-Where is Massimo? -[Adriano] He's not too far.
Not too far. [inhales sharply]
But I think that you have to wait a little longer.
translation.it: Ma dovrai attendere ancora per un po'.

translation.en: He's a busy man.
[clicks tongue] Yeah, I'm happy to spend a lot of time with my new sister-in-law,
translation.it: Ma io sono felice di stare un po' con la mia nuova cognata

translation.en: you know, and have a little chat with her.
translation.it: e di fare due chiacchiere con lei.

translation.en: We have nothing to talk about. I disagree.
translation.it: - Non abbiamo niente di cui parlare. - Non sono d'accordo.

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you a story about taking back what's mine.
translation.it: Ti racconto la storia di come mi riprendo ciò che è mio.

translation.en: I mean, my dad is no longer an obstacle, yeah.
translation.it: Insomma, mio papà non è più un ostacolo.

translation.en: And now…
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
[spluttering] I have to get rid of your husband.
Don't worry, Laura. [chuckles]
I won't leave you alone with him.
translation.it: Non ti lascerò sola con lui.

translation.en: -[music fades] -[Laura] What are you doing here?
What does it look like I'm doing? [scoffs]
[sighs] I'm winning.
Massimo made a huge mistake
by underestimating the anger of the abandoned woman.
translation.it: sottovalutando la rabbia della donna che ha abbandonato.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
You were supposed to wait in Sicily until the negotiations were over.
translation.it: Dovevate aspettare in Sicilia fino alla fine delle trattative.

translation.en: You know them?
Honey, we were the ones who pushed you into his arms.
translation.it: Tesoro, ti abbiamo spinta noi tra le sue braccia.

translation.en: [in English] Sometimes I wonder
if your child
would've looked more like you…
[smacks lips] …or like her.
It's a pity.
It's a pity that we will never know.
Because of the accident.
